name: Aware
description: You are stranded on an island, The plane you came with have crashed, and you are alive. To survive on the island you'll have to find food, water and shelter. It's up to you. Do you have the knowledge to know what you can eat or not? Are you faster alone but maybe stronger as a team? Decide how you want to play the game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 8.1 Processor: Quad-core Intel® or AMD® processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX® 11 compatible card with 1 GB of memory, nVidia® 4XX+/AMD® 5XXX+ DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 452 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Quad-core Intel® or AMD® processor Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX® 11 compatible card with 3 GB of memory, nVidia® 7XX+/AMD® 7XXX+ DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 452 MB available space
